item.description:
Join ECHO each month at our powerful learning and networking event for entrepreneurs of color. Hear experts in a wide variety of fields share advice to take you and your enterprise to the next level.

This month we will discuss some of the many programs available to assist you on your path to entrepreneurial success. Do not miss this VERY valuable event.

 

Free admission with RSVP so register today. More details TBA.

If you would like to sponsor a meeting or provide giveaways, contact echo -at- echonewengland.com

 

*note area parking is limited. The venue is near the Mass Ave. T stop.

 

Please use hashtag #echone when tweeting about this event.

Join our mailing list and get weekly, must-know entrepreneurship news: http://bit.ly/ECHOlist

The mission of ECHO is to support the entrepreneurial community with impactful, innovative programs that foster growth, stimulate ideas, and build unity.
item.name: Entrepreneurs of Color Helping Others (ECHO) Monthly Meeting
